import { debounceTime, distinctUntilChanged, Observable, Subject, switchMap, } from 'rxjs'; import { ProductService } from './../product.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../product'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'product-selector', templateUrl: './product-selector.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-selector.component.sass'], }) export class ProductSelectorComponent implements OnInit { products!: Product[]; private searchTerms = ''; selectedProduct!: Product; constructor(private productService: ProductService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.products = this.productService.getProducts(); } search(term: string): void { this.products = this.productService.searchProducts(term); } onNgSelectOpen() { console.log('awel ma fata7t l select'); // this.search(this.term); } onAddNewProduct() { this.router.navigateByUrl(`products/new`); } }
